Drawcircle <- function(x,y,r,color){
  angle <- seq(0,2*pi,length=100)
  xpoints <- x + r*cos(angle)
  ypoints <- y + r*sin(angle)
  polygon(xpoints,ypoints,col=color,border=NULL)
}
#Drawcircle test
Drawcircle(15,15,5,col="blue")
